name: Color Road (itch) (Tucan444)
description:
Color the whole road, be carefull you cannot walk on paint. Move by tilting your head.

All roads are one use and you cant walk on them twice, choose the right turns to color the whole path.

Made for VR Jam 2022.

Devlog on youtube comming soon:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnF1Eg29RPfFIe3OALPaTVg
